meanings: Verb 균형을 유지하다[잡다], 반듯이[넘어지지 않게] 놓다
Noun (침대 아래로 늘어뜨리는 것과 같은) 장식용 천

vlive.korean: 제가 되게 밸런스를 잘 맞췄죠? I really made a good balance here, huh? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 놀아줄 사람 구해여

vlive.english: You don't know how important balance is when it comes to food?

vlive.korean: 키가 잘생겼어요 - 밸런스가... He's tall. - Balance... 듣기 View video Mnet : 프로듀스101 시즌2 5화

examples.korean: The Balanced Ramp is created using an equal number of hues of red, green and blue. It is not always possible to generate the exact number of colors requested, so fewer colors might be generated. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 밸런스 램프는 동일한 수의 빨강, 녹색 및 파랑을 단계적으로 사용하여 만들어집니다. 만들어지는 색이 요청된 색보다 적은 경우도 있습니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The Balanced Ramp is created using an equal number of hues of red, green and blue. It is not always possible to generate the exact number of colors requested, so fewer colors might be generated. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I think I need a wheel balancing. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 휠 밸런스를 해야겠어요. Neungyule
